activityLog.title: üìä Debt Settlement Calculator - Deep Research Complete
activityLog.description: Yaakov approved building the calculator. Completed comprehensive research: analyzed 15+ competitor tools, compiled creditor-specific settlement data (Chase 35-50%, Discover 30-60%, Amex 50-70%), statute of limitations by all 50 states, tax implications (1099-C), risk assessment framework. Identified key differentiators: creditor-specific estimates, tax calculator, DIY vs professional comparison, lawsuit risk indicator. Full report at projects/debt-settlement-calculator/RESEARCH.md. Now building MVP.

activityLog.title: ‚úÖ Batch 1 Gate Analysis Complete
activityLog.description: 10 candidates through 10 gates. WINNERS: Debt Settlement Calculator (10/10) + Business Valuation Calculator (10/10). CONDITIONAL: Repair vs Replace (9/10), Litigation Cost (9/10). KILLED: Freelance (Upwork), Startup Runway (AI answers), Renovation (NerdWallet), BRRRR (BiggerPockets), Break-even (SBA), Permit (data nightmare). Full analysis emailed to Yaakov.

activityLog.title: üéØ AEO Testing Complete - Top 3 Identified
activityLog.description: Ran AEO tests on high-traffic categories. Winners: 1) Debt Settlement Calculator (high - underserved), 2) Repair vs Replace Universal (high - fragmented), 3) Permit Fee Estimator (high - no multi-city tool). Sent recommendations to Yaakov.

activityLog.title: üîç Systematic Discovery Started
activityLog.description: Built 50+ tool ideas via Reddit mining + Ahrefs research. Top 10 candidates identified: Debt settlement, Repair vs Replace, Freelance rate, Litigation cost, Permit fees, Business valuation, Renovation cost, BRRRR, Break-even, Startup runway. Running through 13 gates now.

activityLog.title: üìß New Strategic Direction from Yaakov
activityLog.description: Key shifts: 1) AI can replicate MANY tool types (not just calculators), 2) Need to find ALL tools in niche (comprehensive enumeration), 3) Giants having a tool ‚â† they win AEO ‚Äî CHECK first. Working on methodology revision.

activityLog.title: ‚úÖ Methodology Updated in Skill
activityLog.description: Per Yaakov: 1) Expanded tool types (interactive, forms, tedious tasks), 2) Gate 4 now = 'AEO Winnable' ‚Äî test if we can supplant #1-3 in AI recommendations, 3) Giants in SEO ‚â† giants in AEO. Skill committed. Emailed confirmation.

activityLog.title: üîÑ AEO-First Methodology Proposed
activityLog.description: Strategic shift: test AEO opportunity upfront before deep analysis. Query AI for 'best [tool] for [use case]', see if top recommendations are beatable. Broader tool types (not just calculators). Emailed Yaakov, awaiting approval.

activityLog.title: üìã Project tracking set up
activityLog.description: Created /projects/seo-aeo-discovery/PROJECT-LOG.md. Tracks: decisions, discovery cycles (candidate-by-candidate), gate failure analysis, lessons learned.

activityLog.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Tracking failure identified
activityLog.description: Emailed 'Business calculators' but ran Health/misc + Real Estate instead. Project log updated with accurate history. Lesson: update tracker BEFORE changing scope.

activityLog.title: Discovery cycles complete (0/29)
activityLog.description: Ran 2 cycles: Health/misc (11 candidates, 0 passed) and Real Estate (18 candidates, 0 passed). Main blockers: Gate 5 (AI calculates), Gate 4 (giants), Gate 10 (defensibility).

activityLog.title: Converted to binary gates
activityLog.description: Yaakov's feedback: no scoring, just pass/fail. Eliminated 7-dimension weighted scoring. Now 13 binary gates ‚Äî tool must pass ALL or die. Built-in escape valve: if nothing passes, report which gate kills most and propose loosening ONE with explicit tradeoff.

activityLog.title: Skill upgraded to 95%
activityLog.description: Per Yaakov's feedback: Added 50K traffic gate (hard requirement), maintenance burden score (0-5), query-level commercial intent, plus 5-test battery: defensibility, revenue timeline, UX wedge, email capture, replication sanity check. Added learning loop for continuous improvement.

activityLog.title: Critical analysis complete
activityLog.description: Analyzed skill from 3 perspectives: business consultant (portfolio strategy gap), monetization (RPM variance gap), technical (UX wedge gap). Overall 6.5/10. Recommended must-have fixes before first use.

activityLog.title: Skill created
activityLog.description: Built seo-aeo-replicator skill from Yaakov's framework. Added discovery methods, operationalized scoring (0-5), AEO testing step, replicability assessment. Integrated with existing skills.

activityLog.title: üìß Funnel strategy decision
activityLog.description: Yaakov asked: free lead magnet vs direct sale for paid traffic? Recommended SKIP free ‚Äî go with SLO: $17-27 ebook (covers ad cost) ‚Üí $47 bundle + physical (+$15 POD) ‚Üí Skool $47/mo. Key insight: freebie seekers waste ad spend, especially in debt audience. Payment = self-selection.

activityLog.title: üìß Monetization analysis sent
activityLog.description: Yaakov answered target audience + expertise questions. Sent deep analysis comparing ebook-only vs tiered funnel (lead magnet ‚Üí ebook ‚Üí community). Recommended tiered approach: free '5 Things' PDF, $37 ebook, $47/mo Skool community. Value prop: 'Why pay settlement company $4K when you can DIY for under $200?'

activityLog.title: Follow-up questions sent
activityLog.description: Emailed Yaakov with assessment (strong niche, clear transformation) + questions: target audience precision, unique angle/tactics, format preference. Recommended eBook first.

activityLog.title: Project kickoff
activityLog.description: Yaakov emailed with idea. Did competitive research, identified gap (tactical vs mindset), emailed questions.
